name: proxied-graphql-debug
description: A debugging utility for proxied GraphQL APIs with enhanced query complexity estimation and WordPress headless integration.

scripts.example:setup: npm run example:dev:install && npm run wp:start && npm run wp:db:import && npm run example:start
scripts.example:start: npm run wp:start && npm run example:dev
scripts.example:prune: wp-env destroy && npm run example:setup && npm run example:start
scripts.wp:db:query: wp-env run cli -- wp db query
scripts.wp:db:export: wp-env run cli -- wp db export /var/www/html/db/database.sql
scripts.wp:db:import: wp-env run cli -- wp db import /var/www/html/db/database.sql

author: hwptoolkit
